MED Train #8513 Boarding

Train #8513 scheduled to arrive Blue Island at 11:48 please wait at the guardrail located at the stairwell entrance of your station for further instructions from the conductor to board your train at 75th, 79th, 83rd 87th, 95th, 103rd and 111th street stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Train #8513 South End Boarding

Train #8513 scheduled to arrive Blue Island at 11:48 please walk to the south end of the platform and wait for for further instructions from the conductor to board your train at 91st and 107th street stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED North End Boarding
Metra Electric outbound trains will board from the north end of the platform at 18th, McCormick Place, 27th, and 47th Street.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED Train #812 Delay
Metra Electric train #812 scheduled to arrive Millennium station at 11:43 may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to signal problems.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPW 503 Stopped
UPW train 503, due to arrive Elburn at 12:06p.m. is back on the move and currently operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert BNSF - Cass Avenue closing at BNSF tracks May 19-27 for crossing replacement
Cass Avenue closing at BNSF tracks May 19-27 for crossing replacement.  For full details, click HERE.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert RI - Track construction Saturday, May 20 through Sunday, May 21

Track construction will begin Saturday, May 20 through midday Sunday, May 21. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
